title: The Rockets Don’t Stay Melo | The Mismatch (Ep. 337)
description:
The Jimmy Butler trade reshapes both conferences (0:48), the Houston Rockets look to move on from their Carmelo Anthony experiment (10:06), the overachieving Los Angeles Clippers remain impressive (19:16), Caris LeVert’s injury sets back the Brooklyn Nets (26:44), and some teams’ expectations contrast with their performance (34:34).

Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor
